attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for murders on children
attributes.additional_details:
Capital punishment no longer exists. Murdering children are frequently reported in the media. The judicial system has limited punishment for such heinous crimes. Bring back the death penalty this offence 

More details
Debate the issue and bring back the death penalty. We believe capital punishment is the only appropriate punishment and deterrent for killing of innocent children. 

Murder is the worst kind of crime. The penalty for such crimes are to lenient. Give the judicial system the option to deal with murder, and certain other offences, by sentencing the criminal to death.
attributes.background: Bring back the death penalty for certain offence - murderIng children

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bring back the death penalty for convicted murderers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601972

Bring back death penalty for child killers and mass murderers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602898
